article_title: New day, new way — but who pays?: Lawmakers get info on RMC programs unveiled in wake of S.C. not expanding Medicaid

og.description: As the Regional Medical Center implements new healthy-living initiatives to reduce health care costs, local Democratic legislators expressed concerns about insurance coverage for the new programs.
